weekly_top_story.headline: House Passes Lower Health Care Premiums for All Americans Act Without ACA Subsidy Extension
weekly_top_story.summary: The House narrowly passed a Republican-led bill to expand association health plans, increase PBM transparency, and fund some Marketplace cost-sharing reductions, but omitted enhanced ACA premium tax credits set to expire end of December, potentially disrupting coverage for millions.

stories.headline: CMS Launches 'Make America Healthy Again: Enhancing Lifestyle and Evaluating Value-based Approaches Through Evidence Model' (MAHA ELEVATE)
stories.summary: CMS announced a new $100 million model funding up to 30 three-year proposals to promote health and prevention for Medicare beneficiaries amid rising chronic diseases, potentially reshaping value-based care incentives.

stories.headline: HHS Terminates Seven Grants to American Academy of Pediatrics Totaling Millions
stories.summary: HHS abruptly ended funding to the AAP for key pediatric initiatives like reducing sudden infant deaths and improving adolescent health, surprising the group critical of federal vaccine policy changes.
